awd_titl_txt: Bilateral US-UK Workshop for Younger Chemists on            Dynamics of Molecule-Surface Interactions, July 22-24, 1991 Liverpool, England
awd_abstract_narration: This award from the Office of Special Projects will enable the                  participation of twelve young U.S. chemists in an NSF-Science                   and Engineering Research Council "(SERC) "Workshop for Younger                  Chemists" in the area of dynamics of molecule-surface interac-                  tions.  The three-day workshop will be held July 22-24, 1991 at                 the University of Liverpool, Liverpool, England.                                                                                                                The workshop will expose chemists in the field of molecule-sur-                 face interactions to the broader community of international                     scholarship for the purpose of establishing long-term bridges                   for productive research collaboration and knowledge exchange.                   All participants have made significant contributions to this                    field.  The number of participants is limited to 24, 12 from                    each side.  Through an open discussion of ideas and unpublished                 results, the workshop will provide a perspective of the                         important problems in the field and establish a solid                           foundation for future significant research.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
